title: (x) APOLLO identity by Cahan Associates - Futura {Geoff}
content:
I was initially thinking Avenir but the A is different.  
Any thoughts?  
Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131003164301im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Apollo_5311.png)
author: Headjam

comments.content:
[Futura Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20131003164301/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=BT.1305.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=APOLLO&sampleSize=48)\* stroked. The L's appears slightly customised to make it more wide.

\* In the bolder weights, <cite>A</cite> doesn't have a pointy top and it's counter is bigger so I'm inclined to think they added a stroke.

Also, [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131003164301/http:/www.typophile.com/node/18710) is a thread discussing which digital cut of Futura is the "best", I like to use Bitstream's.
Thanks Geoff seems like you are spot on :) Cheers.
